text:
="preserve">Lambert “Bertie” Croux (6 March 1927 — 8 July 2020) was a Belgian politician. He was born in Bilzen, Belgium. He was a member of the CVP party. He was a senator from 1977 to 1981 and Member of the European Parliament from 1979 to 1989.
Croux died on 8 July 2020 in Hasselt, Belgium at the age of 93.
